formulas.name: func_DER
formulas.expression: IF(ISNULL({!Get_Curr_Survey.DER__c}) == TRUE, "", "Rp " & IF(LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Survey.DER__c}, 0))) > 12, TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Survey.DER__c}, 0)), IF(LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Survey.DER__c}, 0))) > 9, LEFT(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Survey.DER__c}, 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Survey.DER__c}, 0))) - 9) & "." & MID(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Survey.DER__c}, 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Survey.DER__c}, 0))) - 8, 3) & "." & MID(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Survey.DER__c}, 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Survey.DER__c}, 0))) - 5, 3) & "." & RIGHT(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Survey.DER__c}, 0)), 3), IF(LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Survey.DER__c}, 0))) > 6, LEFT(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Survey.DER__c}, 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Survey.DER__c}, 0))) - 6) & "." & MID(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Survey.DER__c}, 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Survey.DER__c}, 0))) - 5, 3) & "." & RIGHT(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Survey.DER__c}, 0)), 3), IF(LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Survey.DER__c}, 0))) > 3, LEFT(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Survey.DER__c}, 0)), LEN(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Survey.DER__c}, 0))) - 3) & "." & RIGHT(TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Survey.DER__c}, 0)), 3), TEXT(ROUND({!Get_Curr_Survey.DER__c}, 0)) )))))

formulas.name: func_KepemilikanAssetLainnya
formulas.expression: IF ( INCLUDES ( {!varR_Application.Survey__r.Kepemilikan_Asset_Lainnya__c}, "Rumah" ), "Rumah; ","") & IF ( INCLUDES ( {!varR_Application.Survey__r.Kepemilikan_Asset_Lainnya__c} , "Ruko/Kios" ), "Ruko/Kios; ","" ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( {!varR_Application.Survey__r.Kepemilikan_Asset_Lainnya__c} , "Apartemen" ), "Apartemen; ","" ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( {!varR_Application.Survey__r.Kepemilikan_Asset_Lainnya__c} , "Kendaraan Pribadi" ), "Kendaraan Pribadi; ","") & IF ( INCLUDES ( {!varR_Application.Survey__r.Kepemilikan_Asset_Lainnya__c} , "Kendaraan Operasional" ), "Kendaraan Operasional; ","" ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( {!varR_Application.Survey__r.Kepemilikan_Asset_Lainnya__c} , "Mesin Produksi" ), "Mesin Produksi; ","" ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( {!varR_Application.Survey__r.Kepemilikan_Asset_Lainnya__c} , "Gudang" ), "Gudang; ","" ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( {!varR_Application.Survey__r.Kepemilikan_Asset_Lainnya__c} , "Tanah" ), "Tanah; ","" ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( {!varR_Application.Survey__r.Kepemilikan_Asset_Lainnya__c} , "Aset Lainnya" ), "Aset Lainnya; ","" )
